thread.title: Donald Trump Angrily Tweeted About The Appeals Court And Twitter Exploded With Jokes
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Angrily Tweeted About The Appeals Court And Twitter Exploded With Jokes

author: Alyssa Fikse
title: Donald Trump Angrily Tweeted About The Appeals Court And Twitter Exploded With Jokes
text:
Getty Image
On Thursday evening, the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals unanimously ruled against Donald Trump ‘s proposed Muslim ban, deeming it unconstitutional. While an appeal is likely and this case will probably go onto the Supreme Court, this is still a win for many who remember that America is a nation of immigrants. After this loss for Team Trump was announced, many wondered when (not if) the man himself would respond on Twitter, and boy, he did not disappoint. Sad! 
SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 9, 2017 

You would think that Trump would have learned by now that when he sends off angry tweets he is only giving ammunition to the residents of Twitter dot com, but that lesson has yet to sink in. Instead, the cycle continues. Imagining Trump reading these tweets while pouting in a bathrobe makes them even better. 
The courts. pic.twitter.com/fDzgaYw7t1 
— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) February 10, 2017 
My fellow Americans: Ask not what your country can do for you, tweet SEE YOU IN COURT instead.
— Caroline Siede (@CarolineSiede) February 10, 2017 
Three branches was really a smart call by the founders. https://t.co/cxgrPJx1gu 
— Jason Kander (@JasonKander) February 9, 2017 
We have been saying this for a while. https://t.co/JFpVlTYUZm 
— ACLU National (@ACLU) February 10, 2017 
Dear @realDonaldTrump ,
are you mad bro?
With Love,
The Internet
— Anonymous (@YourAnonNews) February 9, 2017 
pic.twitter.com/GN8j2gpxrv 
— Beyond Good & "Evil" (@untimelygamer) February 10, 2017 
SEE YOU IN COURT pic.twitter.com/FRuDAoXoZU 
— Fantasy Jeanyus (@FantasyJeanyus) February 9, 2017 


"See you in court," he says immediately after having been to court. https://t.co/GXkg3ifnFg 
— Parker Molloy (@ParkerMolloy) February 10, 2017 
"I'LL SEE YOU IN COURT!" is really the worst thing to yell after you just lost in court
— Erin Gloria Ryan (@morninggloria) February 9, 2017 
Outside the Oval Office, right now… pic.twitter.com/eJc5ixzRhX 
— FrancescoFrancavilla (@f_francavilla) February 10, 2017 
The POTUS yelling "I'LL SEE YOU IN COURT!" while already in a court is the type of thing no satirist would be clever enough to come up with.
— Yellow Diamond Dust (@TMillionaireIV) February 9, 2017 
Donald Trump right now pic.twitter.com/HBHozyaDXH 
— Alejandrobot (@Alejandrobot) February 9, 2017 
This moment was when it all went wrong for Trump pic.twitter.com/WTSft0yG9A 
— Pixelated Boat (@pixelatedboat) February 10, 2017 
Donald Trump — meet your nemesis. It's undefeated, and it will outlast you. pic.twitter.com/6JQ1it5Bly 
— Operation Pig Roast (@OpPigRoast) February 10, 2017 
pic.twitter.com/9Zk4bcqLLR 
— Rich Lowtax Kyanka (@lowtax) February 10, 2017 
Trump is like Dr. Claw at the end of every episode of Inspector Gadget. https://t.co/UQg4n9T5Fx 
— Maggie Serota (@maggieserota) February 10, 2017 
Headline we'll be seeing a lot of the next several years: Court unanimously rules against the President.
— Ted Alexandro (@tedalexandro) February 10, 2017 


. @POTUS Stop me if you've heard this one before: A conservative, a moderate & a liberal judge walk into a court & agree you're a buffoon! 
— Danny Zuker (@DannyZuker) February 10, 2017 
Oh sweetie that *was* a court. https://t.co/oETUzKtJ5h 
— Zach Broussard (@ZachBroussard) February 9, 2017 
Trump's SEE YOU IN COURT is like if Matt Ryan had gone home and tweeted SEE YOU AT THE SUPER BOWL.
— Daniel Dale (@ddale8) February 9, 2017 
Donald Trump right now. pic.twitter.com/hEtGBVDyvC 
— Amanda (@Pandamoanimum) February 9, 2017 
As bad as Trump feels about losing this, you KNOW he feels worse about losing the Emmy.
— billy eichner (@billyeichner) February 9, 2017 
Grab 'em by the judicial process
— Sam Grittner (@SamGrittner) February 9, 2017 
"LET'S TAKE THIS OUTSIDE," Trump screams in the middle of a field.
— Senator TrillStyle (@mikestill) February 9, 2017 
The so-called judges were warned, they were given an explanation, nevertheless they persisted
— Ari Berman (@AriBerman) February 9, 2017 
Kellyanne Conway announced, "The 9th Circuit Court is as wrong as the cut of my new Ivanka Trump blouse is oh, so right. On sale now!"
— Dana Gould (@danagould) February 9, 2017 
listen i never thought reading news about the court of appeals would ever cause pure unadulterated joy but this is 2017 and here we are
— jomny sun (@jonnysun) February 9, 2017 
An all caps "I'LL SEE YOU IN COURT" is the whitest thing to ever happen in black history month.
— Akilah Hughes (@AkilahObviously) February 10, 2017 

Also, some beautiful shade from Hillary Clinton herself. I sincerely hope that Clinton devotes some of her time to just tweet out factual, to the point interpretations of every single one of Trump’s failures. 
3-0
— Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) February 10, 2017 

We should probably expect Kellyanne Conway to pop in to Fox News to explain away his latest bit of unhinged tweeting within the hour, but for now, just bask in the snark.
